$20 Dairy Farm Gift Voucher can be used at all Giant stores, Cold Storage, Jasons, Market Place, Guardian and 7-Eleven outlets.




Terms and Conditions Dairy Farm Gift Vouchers

  1. This voucher expires 12 months from the month of issue.
  2. This voucher is valid only when duly stamped and signed by authorised signatory.
  3. This voucher is valid only within Singapore and its value is equivalent to the Singapore currency as printed.
  4. This voucher is not refundable and cannot be replaced if lost, damaged or expired.
  5. This voucher is not refundable or exchangeable for cash and any unused balance will not be refunded.

$10 Dairy Farm Voucher will be mailed to you upon redemption.
